description: Marseille are PSG's fierce rivals and disturbances are feared for the Champions League final.
title: Police cancel ban on Paris Saint-Germain shirts in Marseille for Champions League final
title_page: Police cancel ban on Paris Saint-Germain shirts in Marseille for Champions League final - BBC News
maintext: Justifying its initial ban, the police said "there is strong animosity on the part of some Marseille residents, supporters or not, toward the PSG team, in contradiction with any sporting spirit".
